channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-7567] [replication] Create an interface for replication peers
item.summary: [replication] Create an interface for replication peers

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Stack Jean-Daniel Cryans

Attaching patch for peers interface. The three major changes in this are:

  • Added ReplicationPeers interface and ReplicationPeersZKImpl.
  • Added an init() method to interfaces. Initialization tasks involving zookeeper are now done in an init method instead of in the implementation class constructors.
  • Added a test for ReplicationPeersInterface.

Will post review board request soon.

Thanks!
Submitting patch for a QA run. All replication related tests pass locally on trunk and 0.95.
Review Board request: https://reviews.apache.org/r/10787/

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12580570/HBASE-7564-trunk-95-v1.patch
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 12 new or modified tests.

+1 hadoop1.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 1.0 profile.

+1 hadoop2.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 2.0 profile.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

-1 lineLengths. The patch introduces lines longer than 100

org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestAdmin
